definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
determiner (in grammar, i.e. article, demonstrative, possessive pronoun, noun genitive etc)

sentences.english: Determiners are used at the beginning of noun groups.
sentences.chinese: 限定词用于名词短语前面。

sentences.english: Thus, lazy operators are used to solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们添加“懒惰”限定符来解决问题。

sentences.english: The tokens are replaced with the fully qualified value.
sentences.chinese: 将标记替换为完全限定值。

sentences.english: DP hypothesis concerns with determiner phrases.
sentences.chinese: DP假说是关于限定词短语的假说。

sentences.english: Substitute your fully qualified host name for the localhost.
sentences.chinese: 请用全限定主机名替换本地主机。
因此，尽量避免过度使用该限定符。

sentences.english: The hostname specified needs to be fully qualified.
sentences.chinese: 指定的主机名需要是完全限定的。

sentences.english: I confine myself to five cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 我限定自己每天只抽五支烟。

sentences.english: Some drives have pass-through signaling on encoders and limits.
sentences.chinese: 一些设备发送信号采用编码器传输和限定。

sentences.english: It may be possible to disambiguate by using fully qualified names.
sentences.chinese: 使用完全限定的名称可能会消除歧义。

sentences.english: U-en thinks the deer stone is no later than 7th century B. C.
sentences.chinese: 乌恩把鹿石年代下限定在公元前7世纪失之过早。

sentences.english: The minimum allowable values of the energy efficiency and. Energy …
sentences.chinese: 房间空调器机能效限定值与节能评价值。

sentences.english: Certain commodities are not presently considered egg products and are exempt from this law.
sentences.chinese: 目前一些商品还不认为是蛋制品并且免于法律的限定。

sentences.english: Qualifiers define how much management must be provided for a component at runtime.
sentences.chinese: 限定符定义了在运行时必须为一个组件提供多少管理。

sentences.english: and he's not limiting this, for example, to electrons.
sentences.chinese: 而且它没有做任何限定，比如说电子。

sentences.english: References to properties and methods often require an explicit object qualifier.
sentences.chinese: 对属性和方法的引用通常需要显式的对象限定符。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to exclude/not including sth (when counting or listing)/except for
to appoint/to assign/to indicate clearly and with certainty/designated
according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
